channel.title: Need a reliable money making method
channel.description:
I'd really appreciate if you guys could post some good money making methods for me? I haven't caught up with the game much and merchanting/dicing is not an option (dicing because its pointless unless you're a host, and economy is shit stable right now) and skilling is too slow.
If you have a really nice (secret) way of making money, id appreciate it if you pmed me the method :) Don't worry, I don't blab around and tell everyone. If you only pm me and don't post about it you wont be bugged by other members ;)
I have 20m worth of armor, and 10m worth of d legs, and 1.7m cash. Oh and 100 combat
Thanks!

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Doing them both now

And thats an awesome spreadsheet

lol bought 10 d boots for 125k, man this second crash is wonderful. Buy up guys.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

They’re easy as fuck, nowhere near those and shouldn’t take too long either.

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Throne of Miscellania to actually do kingdom, and Royal Trouble makes the rewards a lot better.

Snapdragons require 62 farming, you should probably do Ranarrs until then if you aren’t already.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:21, topic:419860”][quote author=Rich link=topic=522397.msg3798838#msg3798838 date=1319856242]
Farming snapdragons with Juju farming pots is easily ~1mil profit a day for not much work at all. Also, kingdom.
[/quote]
What quest was the kingdom again? And what level farming is that? IIRC im 42, I can make 200k a farm run but thats bound to rise because of the nuke.[/quote]

well you got rev hunting, killing drags, farming, slayer, merching and dicing.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

A really good way to make money is buying 1k baskests for 1k teleing to karamja picking bananas putting in basket 609gp ea and people buy it so 300k/hr, May not be the best way to make money but it worked for me

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I have found Slayer to be a really nice money method. I am a level 100+6 and I only have 46 slayer, 6M off it alreay in 1 day. Luck though.

item.source: Need a reliable money making method

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:6, topic:419860”][quote author=Frell link=topic=522397.msg3798765#msg3798765 date=1319852898]
They’re not going to return that soon, the whiplash ‘crash’ has already started, after the second rise theyll stabilize. I normally would merchant but the fact that the prices update once a day the wait is absolutely terrifying to me, and flipping is just annoying with the 4 hour thing. So I bought 10m worth of d legs I figure its a win win because either

  1. Bots return and I quit playing again and dont care

  2. Bots don’t return and price is guaranteed to raise

Cant think of any good merchanting items either though (pm if you have a good one! :D)
[/quote]
Without the bots demanding the high volume of d legs they might drop.[/quote]
Without the bots supplying the high volume of d legs they might rise.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:419860”]That logic works for most items but you have to remember, bots wore d legs to most likely bot metal dragons (which drop d legs)

So there was a constant flow of d legs into the game that causes the price to go from 1m-150k in not even a year, where from 2007-2010 they went from 2.9-1.2m (over 3-4 yrs).

Now, being 150k, they’re excellent defense and really cheap which means pkers use them alot, and theyll be risked more often against bosses.

They’re more than likely going to go back to about 400-500k and stabilize.[/quote]
Hmm guess you are right, I remember when D legs were more then 2m. (: Miss days when you could go behind Varrock bank and buy full guthix for 1m.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a reliable money making method

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:419860”]Yea gf for the few months they’re short on members… and then soon enough theyll have 180k legit players. Bots didn’t permanently damage runescapes player count or anything. Once jacmob admits things will be slowing down with rsbuddy alot of botters will come back and not mind playing legit.

Judo, they started going under 1m when bots started to become very common.[/quote]

I know, I’m just saying I can remember when they were 900k, and then this year they dropped drastically.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

That logic works for most items but you have to remember, bots wore d legs to most likely bot metal dragons (which drop d legs)

So there was a constant flow of d legs into the game that causes the price to go from 1m-150k in not even a year, where from 2007-2010 they went from 2.9-1.2m (over 3-4 yrs).

Now, being 150k, they’re excellent defense and really cheap which means pkers use them alot, and theyll be risked more often against bosses.

They’re more than likely going to go back to about 400-500k and stabilize.

item.title: Need a reliable money making method
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

rip4d:

Merch once the prices of everything are stabile. With the bot nuke, I’m sure many prices were shaken up quite a bit. Once they return to normal, it should be safe and effective to merch more items.

That would be #1 for me

#2:
Go rev hunting, I’ve made roughly 1m from it, but it’s extremely dangerous.
